gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
equips oneself with something
ali kadar nekdo
equips someone with something
, nekdo nekaj dobi v določen namen.

seg.quote: They equip themselves with a great variety of gadgets.
The enemy troops were equipped with tanks, aircraft and missiles.
By contrast, their competitors were superbly equipped.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
equipped with a particular feature
, ima določeno lastnost.

seg.quote: The card will be equipped with a built-in computer chip.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
equips someone for a task or experience
, nekoga miselno pripravi na neko nalogo ali izkušnjo.

seg.quote: Little in their history has equipped them for coping with this problem.
They were ill equipped to deal with the situation.
